name: not quite dead yet (89o)
description:
the clock is ticking,

the world is ending.

the end is nigh

and nobody cares.

welcome home.

-- John Ernest Greene,

-- The Meteor

march 24, 2020. you are a security guard at grink, inc. in the lush lush times of the tenebrae pandemic. dont look at them. dont look at them. whatever you do, dont [][][][]ing look at them.

if you cant tell, this is a metaphor of the 2020 coronavirus pandemic. the stupidity of society, and the carelessness of governments. the greed of corporations, and the forgetfulness of the people.

if youre reading this, wear your [][][][]ing mask, karen. its not about your freedom. its about society. its about everyone else. youre not the only person in the world.

made entirely by 89o. original cartridge by joaquin schwarz. made for the 2020 agbic jam.
